title: _WHEA_MEMORY_ERROR_SECTION_VALIDBITS (ntddk.h)
description: The WHEA_MEMORY_ERROR_SECTION_VALIDBITS union describes which members of a WHEA_MEMORY_ERROR_SECTION structure contain valid data.
